testcase.classname: feature to Test the View Return Order Screen functionality
testcase.name: Verify the Item Partial received functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And User click on the View Return Order under the Orders Module.............passed And The View Return Order Screen is displayed or not........................passed Then User Select the State..................................................passed And User Select the Sales Person............................................passed And Select the Status.......................................................passed And User Select the From date and To Date...................................passed And Click on the Search button..............................................passed And Click on the Order Expansion Icon.......................................passed And User Select the Check Box...............................................passed And User Click on the Partial Received Icon.................................passed Then The Partial Received Popup page is displayed or not when click on the Partial Received Icon.passed And Click on the Save button in the Partial Received popup page.............passed Then The Validation message is displayed or not.............................passed When The User enter the Partial Qty is More than the Original Qty the validation message is displayed.passed Given User Enter the data in the Partial Received Qty field.................passed Given User enter the data in the Remarks field..............................passed And Click on the Close button...............................................passed
